scripts.build: prisma generate && prisma generate --schema=prisma/scraper/schema.prisma && next build
scripts.db:reset: npx prisma migrate reset --force && npm run db:seed
scripts.scraper:sync: cd lease-scraper/apps/scraper && SKIP_IMAGE_DOWNLOAD=true npx tsx src/cli/index.ts sync --source michiganrental --limit 0
scripts.scraper:sync-html: cd lease-scraper/apps/scraper && npx tsx src/cli/index.ts sync-html
scripts.scraper:sync-all: cd lease-scraper/apps/scraper && SKIP_IMAGE_DOWNLOAD=true npx tsx src/cli/index.ts sync-all
scripts.scraper:contacts: cd lease-scraper/apps/scraper && npx tsx src/cli/index.ts scrape-contacts --limit 0
